doku.title: Anyone who has seen Blood?
doku.author: BloodHeart
doku.entry:
Ok, probably the easiest command ##BOTNAME## ;)
[quote][b]!Seen[/b] [i]BloodHeart[/i][/quote] has indicates when the last user of the times online or logged into LoU. [quote][b]!Chat[/b] [i]BloodHeart[/i][/quote] has shown to the user when the last time you chatted.
This only works internal Ally :(
